name: js-chat
description: * start from the up-to-date main branch (`git checkout main; git pull origin main`) * Create a feature branch named 'js-chat' (`git checkout -b js-chat`) * Create the files in this directory to have the require features * Add, commit, and push the branch to github * Create a PR to merge to main * Be sure to include the TA(s) and I as reviewers.   * Due by **Mon Jul 13, 11:59pm (ET)**
author: Yashwanth Sridharan
